sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.

sentences.english: The peonies are in full bloom in the park. If you go to see them, I will accompany you.

sentences.english: The short blooming period hinders the development of the floricultural industry of moutan peonies .

sentences.english: Once the peony smile, also heel the Hui go upstairs.

sentences.english: Luoyang City is the most suitable region for flower, especially for peony.
sentences.chinese: 洛阳地脉花最宜，牡丹尤为天下奇。

sentences.english: The molding of love in The Peony Pavilion is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 而《牡丹亭》对情的塑形是含混的。

sentences.english: Heze is quite famous for its peony flowers . It is the home of peony.

sentences.english: This result could provide a reference to predicting the optimum time of ornamental peonies in Heze.

sentences.english: Only the peony is really a national beauty with its bloom shocking the capital.

sentences.english: As is known to all, the keynote of the Peony Pavilion is love.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，《牡丹亭》的主旨是写“情”。

sentences.english: The beauty of Luoyang Peony Chuo must not only, but also of great medicinal value.
